alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 27 at 2:42PM CST until February 28 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CST TUESDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE NORTHEAST PANHANDLES... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 8 PM CST Tuesday. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Beaver. In Texas...Lipscomb. * 20 Foot Winds...West winds 15 to 25 mph, with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 3. * Timing...10 AM through 8 PM CST Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
